com.jess.arms.widget.boxing

类 AbsBoxingViewFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.jess.arms.widget.boxing.AbsBoxingViewFragment
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PickerContract.View
    直接已知子类:
    BoxingBottomSheetFragment, BoxingViewFragment

    public abstract class AbsBoxingViewFragment
extends Fragment
implements PickerContract.View
    A abstract class which implements PickerContract.View for custom media view. only one methods need to override startLoading(), but there is more function to achieve by checking every method can override.
    作者:
    ChenSL

    • 方法详细资料

      • startLoading

        public abstract void startLoading()
        start loading when the permission request is completed. call loadMedias() or loadMedias(int, String), call loadAlbum() if albums needed.

      • onRequestPermissionError

        public void onRequestPermissionError(String[] permissions,
                                     Exception e)
        called when request Manifest.permission#WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and Manifest.permission#CAMERA permission error.
        参数:
        e - a IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException or SecurityException will be throw

      • onRequestPermissionSuc

        public void onRequestPermissionSuc(int requestCode,
                                   String[] permissions,
                                   int[] grantResults)
        called when request Manifest.permission#WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and Manifest.permission#CAMERA permission successfully.

      • onCameraFinish

        public void onCameraFinish(BaseMedia media)
        get the result of using camera to take a photo.
        参数:
        media - BaseMedia

      • onCameraError

        public void onCameraError()
        called when camera start error

      • onCreateWithSelectedMedias

        public void onCreateWithSelectedMedias(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                                       List<BaseMedia> selectedMedias)
        must override when care about the input medias, which means you call setSelectedBundle(ArrayList) first. this method is called in Fragment#onCreate(Bundle), so override this rather than Fragment#onCreate(Bundle).
        参数:
        bundle - If the fragment is being re-created from a previous saved state, this is the state.
        selectedMedias - the input medias, the parameter of setSelectedBundle(ArrayList).

      • showMedia

        public void showMedia(List<BaseMedia> medias,
                      int allCount)
        override this method to handle the medias. make sure loadMedias() ()} being called first.
        指定者:
        showMedia 在接口中 PickerContract.View
        参数:
        medias - the results of medias

      • showAlbum

        public void showAlbum(List<AlbumEntity> albums)
        override this method to handle the album. make sure loadAlbum() being called first.
        指定者:
        showAlbum 在接口中 PickerContract.View
        参数:
        albums - the results of albums

      • clearMedia

        public void clearMedia()
        to clear all medias the first time(the page number is 0). do some clean work.
        指定者:
        clearMedia 在接口中 PickerContract.View

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onViewCreated

        public void onViewCreated(android.view.View view,
                          android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       String[] permissions,
                                       int[] grantResults)

      • setSelectedBundle

        public final AbsBoxingViewFragment setSelectedBundle(ArrayList<BaseMedia> selectedMedias)
        called when you have input medias, then call onCreateWithSelectedMedias(Bundle, List) to get the input medias.
        参数:
        selectedMedias - input medias
        返回:
        AbsBoxingViewFragment

      • setPresenter

        public final void setPresenter(PickerContract.Presenter presenter)
        从接口复制的说明: PickerContract.View
        set the presenter attaching to the view
        指定者:
        setPresenter 在接口中 PickerContract.View

      • getAppCr

        public final android.content.ContentResolver getAppCr()
        get the ContentResolver
        指定者:
        getAppCr 在接口中 PickerContract.View

      • onFinish

        public void onFinish(List<BaseMedia> medias)
        called the job is done.Click the ok button, take a photo from camera, crop a photo. most of the time, you do not have to override.
        指定者:
        onFinish 在接口中 PickerContract.View
        参数:
        medias - the list of selection

      • hasCropBehavior

        public final boolean hasCropBehavior()
        need crop or not
        返回:
        true, need it.

      • startCrop

        public final void startCrop(BaseMedia media,
                            int requestCode)
        to start the crop behavior, call it when hasCropBehavior() return true.
        指定者:
        startCrop 在接口中 PickerContract.View
        参数:
        media - the media to be cropped.
        requestCode - The integer request code originally supplied to startActivityForResult(), allowing you to identify who this result came from.

      • setPickerConfig

        public final void setPickerConfig(BoxingConfig config)
        set or update the config.most of the time, you do not have to call it.
        指定者:
        setPickerConfig 在接口中 PickerContract.View
        参数:
        config - BoxingConfig

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             android.content.Intent data)

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)

      • onSaveMedias

        public final void onSaveMedias(android.os.Bundle outState,
                               ArrayList<BaseMedia> selected)
        in BoxingConfig.Mode#MULTI_IMG, call this in Fragment#onSaveInstanceState(Bundle).
        参数:
        outState - Bundle in which to place your saved state.
        selected - the selected medias.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        call this to clear resource.

      • checkSelectedMedia

        public final void checkSelectedMedia(List<BaseMedia> allMedias,
                                     List<BaseMedia> selectedMedias)
        in BoxingConfig.Mode#MULTI_IMG, call this to pick the selected medias in all medias.

      • loadMedias

        public final void loadMedias()
        load first page of medias. use showMedia(List, int) to get the result.

      • loadMedias

        public final void loadMedias(int page,
                             String albumId)
        load the medias for the specify page and album id. use showMedia(List, int) to get the result.
        参数:
        page - page numbers.
        albumId - the album id is AlbumEntity.mBucketId.

      • loadAlbum

        public void loadAlbum()
        extra call to load albums in database, use showAlbum(List) to get result. In BoxingConfig.Mode#VIDEO it is not necessary.

      • hasNextPage

        public final boolean hasNextPage()

      • canLoadNextPage

        public final boolean canLoadNextPage()

      • onLoadNextPage

        public final void onLoadNextPage()

      • getMaxCount

        public final int getMaxCount()
        get the max count set before

      • onCameraActivityResult

        public void onCameraActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                   int resultCode)
        successfully get result from camera in onActivityResult(int, int, Intent). call this after other operations.

      • onCropActivityResult

        public void onCropActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                 int resultCode,
                                 android.content.Intent data)
        successfully get result from crop in onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)

      • startCamera

        public final void startCamera(android.app.Activity activity,
                              Fragment fragment,
                              String subFolderPath)
        start camera to take a photo.
        参数:
        activity - the caller activity.
        fragment - the caller fragment, may be null.
        subFolderPath - the folder name in "DCIM/bili/boxing/"
